description.originalText: Fatou was friendly, punctual, and kind. She was an excellent post-procedure caregiver for me. I would hire Fatou again.

description.displayText: Fatou did an outstanding job getting my dad to and from his doctor appointment. She texted me several photos and videos and kept me updated on their progress. I highly recommend Fatou.
description.originalText: Fatou did an outstanding job getting my dad to and from his doctor appointment. She texted me several photos and videos and kept me updated on their progress. I highly recommend Fatou.

description.displayText:
I can't say enough glowing words to describe how brilliant Fatou is. She cared for my father with such love and care and expertise. She started with us part-time and then went to full-time. My family and I I feel so blessed to have found her . I know that anyone who hires her will feel the same way....feel free to email me if you have any questions.. Charlotte

description.displayText:
To Whom it may concern,
Fatou D has worked for us on and off since 2012.

Her medical knowledge is extensive!  She has many years of experience, with a very well-rounded knowledge, including working in a variety of medical facilities and private care.   Her calm resolve was unshakable; and her contact with me (the daughter who lives out of state) was continuous, accurate, and spot on whenever there was a medical issue. It gave me piece of mind being many miles away. When I was in New York visiting, which was very often over the years, I was able to see first-hand how wonderful she was with my mother! 

We found her service to be invaluable.

We are sure that if you hire you will be very happy.

description.displayText: It is my pleasure to give a recommendation for Mrs. Fatou D. I have come in contact with Fatou D at my Job( private home care). We work together for about two years and through these years she has been helpful, humble and shows great leadership skills. Fatou D also follow directions well with a great heart for patient care. She has always been a great help to all the co-worker in transporting patients and with activity of daily living on a daily basis. The staff speak highly of her with her compassion and willingness to assist those in need.

description.displayText: Fatou took care of my mother for the 5 years preceding her death at almost 91.   She was caring, reliable, competent and a pleasure to be around.  Please don't hesitate to contact me for any further detail.
